meanings.definition: The measurement or extent of something from end to end.
meanings.sent1: The length of the table is three feet.
meanings.sent2: She measured the length of the room with a tape measure.
meanings.sent3: The length of the line at the store made her reconsider shopping.
meanings.sent4: The length of the journey seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The length of the snake startled the hikers on the trail.

meanings.sent1: The length of the movie made it hard to sit through.
meanings.sent2: The length of the dress was perfect for the formal event.
meanings.sent3: His explanation had a great length, but lacked clarity.
meanings.sent4: The length of the queue at the amusement park was frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The incredible length of the bridge amazed the engineers.

meanings.definition: The amount of time something lasts.
meanings.sent1: The length of the meeting was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the length of the concert.
meanings.sent3: The length of the movie made it feel like an eternity.
meanings.sent4: The length of the delay caused frustration among the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The remarkable length of the eclipse left spectators in awe.
